description: .500 S&W Magnum ammunition with a 500gr bullet.  The .500 S&W Magnum round is a colossally powerful handgun cartridge capable of killing almost any target with one hit.  It has extremely high damage, and recoil to match.

.500 S&W Magnum ammunition with a 500gr bullet.  The .500 S&W Magnum round is a colossally powerful handgun cartridge capable of killing almost any target with one hit.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

.500 S&W Magnum ammunition with a 500gr bullet.  The .500 S&W Magnum round is a colossally powerful handgun cartridge capable of killing almost any target with one hit.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
